mean_cn: v. 搜身，蹦跳，欢跃；  n. 欢跃，蹦跳，快活的时刻
mean_en: to pass your hands over (someone) to search for something that may be hidden in clothing
short_phrase: The police officer frisks the woman.
sentence: The police officer frisks the woman, looking for drugs or other illegal items.
sentence_trans: 警察搜这个女人的身，查找有无携带毒品或其他非法物品。
